Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I Want to ask if you can programme the medium landing gear with steer, like if you can add a motor to that landing gear i tried to copy a module from a roverwheel but in the game it says in the motor part "Not Enough"

Anyway my main question is if you can, can someone help me with that?

Medium wheels already steer in stock in 1.1.x.  It's the large and extra large that don't steer.

As to adding steering, that doesn't work with stock modules AFAIK (I've tried).  It might not even worth with Firespitter modules.  But I'm pretty sure you can add motors to them with Firespitter modules.
